item.description:
YJP Boston has created the ultimate networking hub for Young Jewish Professionals who wish to advance their careers through knowledgeable CEO insights and connections with fellow peers in the industry. Atendees are Young Professionals who work within, or are interested in the hedge fund, private equity and finance industries.
--------------------------------------------------------------

KIDDUSH, SUSHI AND COCKTAILS

7:15pm: Kiddush, Sushi and Cocktails

8:00pm: Dinner

8:30pm: Presenter: Ronnie Sadka
Professor of Finance - Boston College

Enjoy assorted fine wines and spirits at open drink table, open dessert bar, plenty of opportunity to meet and connect with many Young Professionals and leaders in your industry.

$25 Couvert - $180 Sponsor (Includes 3 seats)

RSVP Required - Place cards will be provided!
To see facebook eveny go here https://www.facebook.com/events/358995854211024/
To RSVP go to: www.GetChai.com/Finance
item.name: Chai Finance Sushi, Cocktails & Kiddush Event
